Trade/Device Name(s): BD Phoenix™M Automated Microbiology System Imipenem (0.0625-32 μg/mL)
BD Phoenix™ Automated Microbiology System for use with the antimicrobial agent Imipenem (0.0625-32 μg/mL) - Gram-negative ID/AST or AST only Phoenix Panels
Regulation Name(s): Fully Automated Short-Term Incubation Cycle Antimicrobial Susceptibility System
Specimen Type(s): Pure culture isolates of Gram-negative aerobic and facultative anaerobic bacteria
Pure culture isolates of Gram-positive bacteria
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Phoenix Automated Microbiology System for rapid identification and antimicrobial susceptibility testing of Gram-negative bacteria using Imipenem panels
Indications for Use Summary: For in vitro quantitative determination of antimicrobial susceptibility (MIC) of Gram-negative aerobic and facultative anaerobic bacteria (Enterobacteriaceae and NonEnterobacteriaceae) and Gram-positive bacteria (Staphylococcus, Enterococcus, Streptococcus) isolates from pure culture using Imipenem panels
